title: 📊 Market Intel — Feb 17, 2026 4:00 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Feb 17, 2026 4:00 PM ET

**Top Headlines: BTC Slips Below $67K as Software Stocks Plunge | Anthropic's Claude Sonnet 4.6 Drops (HN #1) | Gold Hovers Near $5,000/oz | Stripe's Bridge Wins Bank Charter | eToro Jumps 14% on Record Q4 | CFTC vs States on Prediction Markets**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Bitcoin drops below $67,000** — Software stocks continue plunging, dragging crypto with them. BTC-Nasdaq correlation has turned positive again. Strategy (Saylor) bought $168M in BTC last week. *(CoinDesk)*
- **Gold near $5,000/oz** — Hovering at historic levels with US and China markets closed for holiday. *(Yahoo Finance/Bloomberg)*
- **Anthropic's Claude Sonnet 4.6 released** — Massive buzz on Hacker News (537 pts, 439 comments), top trending story in tech. *(Anthropic)*
- **Stripe's stablecoin arm Bridge wins national bank trust charter** — Major regulatory milestone allowing stablecoin issuance under federal oversight. *(CoinDesk)*
- **eToro shares surge 14%** after posting record Q4 profit despite crypto revenue drop — outperforming Robinhood and Coinbase. *(CoinDesk)*

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

- **Software sector selloff continues** — iShares Tech-Software ETF down another ~3% Tuesday, dragging broader tech
- **eToro** — +14% on record earnings; crypto revenue down but overall profits hit ATH
- **WDC (Western Digital)** — Up 450%+ in a year on AI storage demand, analysts say more room to run *(Yahoo Finance)*
- **SSD (Simpson Manufacturing)** — PT raised to $200 by Stephens on operational resilience
- **MERC (Mercer International)** — Downgraded by TD Cowen on leverage concerns
- **AN (AutoNation)** — Fresh Argus analyst report
- **MATW (Matthews International)** — Founding-era leaders regain control

### Earnings Week (2/16 - 2/20)
- WSB Earnings Thread pinned — key reports this week (check individual tickers)

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC: ~$67,000** — Slipped below key level, pressure from software stock correlation
- **Crypto VC firm Dragonfly raises $650M** despite "gloom of a bear market" — 4th fund, alongside a16z and Paradigm *(CoinDesk)*
- **BitGo** — Analysts (Compass Point, Canaccord) call it a potential Wall Street acquisition target despite weak IPO debut *(CoinDesk)*
- **Nakamoto acquires BTC Inc and UTXO** in $107M all-stock deal — dilution concerns from shareholders *(CoinDesk)*
- **Strategy bought $168M in BTC** last week *(CoinDesk)*
- **DeFi protocol ZeroLend shuts down** after 3 years, citing inactive chains and hacks *(CoinDesk)*
- **Crypto sliding alongside tech stocks and gold** — BTC-Nasdaq correlation turning positive again
